featured.text: Posters of the local rock band were displayed in store windows to promote the sale of their _____ tickets.

definition.zh_def: 海報：用於宣傳或展示信息的印刷品，通常張貼在公共場所。
definition.en_def: A poster is a printed paper designed to be attached to a wall or vertical surface, used for advertising or conveying information.
definition.example: The school put up a poster to promote the upcoming science fair.
